title: Portabello, red pepper and rocket salad
ingredients: ['1 portabello mushroom, stem removed', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 teaspoon red wine vinegar', '1 clove garlic, thinly sliced', '1/4 shallot, thinly sliced', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1/2 roasted red pepper, cut into strips', '60g rocket leaves', '30g grated Pecorino Romano cheese', '1 tablespoon Italian salad dressing']
